title: Toasted Pandoro with Berries and Mascarpone Cream
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons mascarpone cheese', '125ml cream', '1 teaspoon Muscat dessert wine', '1 tablespoon icing sugar', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '6 (1cm) slices Pandoro', '3 nectarines, stones removed and thinly sliced', '575g mixed berries', 'icing sugar, for dusting']
